remark.ch:
1.限生科系植物暨微生物環境生物組博士生
2.與LS6017A合併上課

goal.ch:
1. 針對學生在科學研究上之「邏輯思考」，「自我學習」及「闡述表達」方面作積極之訓練。
2. 擴增學生對現今生命科學領域「深度」及「廣度」之瞭解。
3. 同儕審視研究內容之練習
goal.en:
1.Training students in “logical thinking,“ “self-learning,“ and “articulate expression“ in scientific research.
2.Enabling students to have a deeper and broader understanding of the current field of life sciences.
3.Peer-review exercises among classmates to examine research content.

outline.ch:
1. Global warming and its effects on living organism
2. RNA helicase and plant stress acclimation
3. RNA silencing for crop improvement
4. Signal transduction of neuron cells
5. Water transport and aquaporin
6. Mid-term discussion
7. Microbial remediation
8. Microbial bio-farming
9. Environmental hormone
10. Bio-fuel
11. Detergent and environment
12. Biological clock
13. Molecular pain
14. Final conclusion and discussion
